name: Noodle Pot
description:
Introducing Noodle Pot - the world's most accurate 8bit Noodle Pot™ experience simulator.

Follow the instructions on the packet and learn how to create 5 star Noodle Pots™!

---

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam 156: Noodle after a series failures to deliver better(?) ideas.

Please forgive me for your time :)
